Text:
Thanks muchly for this torrent, UFOpirate, there are several pieces of footage on this show that are new to me.

Pretty scary stuff!

P.S.  James Coburn doesn't "host" this show.  It was originally narrated by Don Lafontaine, however the narration was re-recorded by a fellow with an English accent (who sounds familiar but I don't remember his name) to suit a British audience.
thank you for posting this, it's one of the best ghost specials i've seen yet..
